products.title: Lumiere Unlined Ombre Teal Roman Blind
products.description: Featuring clarissa hulses signature ombre style, the lumiere unlined ombre teal roman blind showcases glorious blues as they gently flow down the fabric becoming more intense. The tranquil shade creates a sense of calm, helping you to make a space you can completely relax in.
